About The Great Plumbing Co.
Why waste time looking around for a plumber while your plumbing problem gets worse? The Great Plumbing Co. provides the fast, friendly expertise you need when there’s no time to wait.
***
The Great Plumbing Co. is a 100% locally owned and operated Canadian based plumbing company. For nearly three decades, we have been proudly serving residents in Toronto, ON and the greater Toronto area, solving their residential and commercial plumbing problems.
***
As a full-service plumbing company focused on providing high quality plumbing solutions and unbeatable customer care, there is no job too small or too large for us to handle. Whether it’s a small repair, full installation or remodeling project, we will always take the time to listen to your concerns, and work with you to decide on a cost-effective solution.
***
Trusted Plumbing Experts Since 1989
When we opened our doors in 1989, Founder and Master Plumber, Jeff Wright set out with the goal of helping homeowners in the greater Toronto area with their residential plumbing needs. Providing value for the customer with a respectful, professional, and quality service approach has always been his top priority from the start.
***
Several years after we started The Great Plumbing Co., industry was booming in the GTA and we saw an even greater need outside the residential plumbing space. Thus, we shifted our attention to provide general contracting for local business owners. Fast forward to 1999 when we took the opportunity to become involved with the city’s development, providing CCTV inspection and cleaning of large diameter sewers.
***
While we gained valuable experience from working in the commercial and industrial space, today we are happy to be back to our roots focused on helping homeowners with their residential plumbing needs. We’ve been able to help thousands of homeowners ease the inconvenience that plumbing issues can cause and keep their appliances and fixtures running flawlessly.
***
What Can You Expect from Us?
When you call The Great Plumbing Co., you’ll speak with a friendly, knowledgeable advisor. Upon your request, we will be happy to send a licensed and insured plumber who will be able to answer your questions and provide you with a written quote for the work required.
***
Enjoy the benefits of working with a reliable, professional plumbing company that prioritizes your needs:
***

Friendly, Local Experts
Licensed and Insured
Cutting-Edge Technology

No Mess
